content.text:
The SPEAKER pro tempore (Mr. Hollingsworth). The Chair will entertain 
up to 15 further requests for 1-minute speeches on each side of the 
aisle.
content.speaker: The SPEAKER pro tempore (Mr. Hollingsworth)

doc_title: ANNOUNCEMENT BY THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE
title: ANNOUNCEMENT BY THE SPEAKER PRO TEMPORE
